name: nativescript-sqlite-access
description: NativeScript plugin to access and manage sqlite data on Android & iOS

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angularb && ns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && ns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo-svelte.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-svelte && ns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run android
scripts.demo-svelte.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-svelte && ns run android
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angularb && ns run android
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && ns run android
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns test android --env.codeCoverage
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns test ios --env.codeCoverage
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove nativescript-sqlite-access && ns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
